author: stsp
msg: (serf_linebuf_fetch): Serf values performance more than NUL terminated

author: rhuijben
msg: Properly pass the right baton value to the pollset_rm() functions.
Currently this value is unused, but we should pass the proper value anyway.
remove_connection): Pass the right baton value (the value that
we expect when polling). Luckily this function makes sure we don't

author: rhuijben
msg: Cast the client data from the baton to the proper type before passing it
(serf_context_run): Correctness fix. The value is directly passed as void*.

author: rhuijben
msg: Avoid reading beyond the data on the http status line.
(parse_status_line): Return a proper parser error for several cases that
used to be parsed as valid, and then caused invalid states.
